course_title: Infectious Disease Dynamics: Theory and Models
class_notes: Please note: Only open to second-year MPH and MSPH and PhD students.  Priority registration will be for accepted second-year ID EPI certificate students and PhD students across all RSPH departments. Others need instructor approval to enroll.   Pre-requisite is some knowledge of R via RSPH courses or independent learning prior to beginning of class.
course_description: This course will present the conceptual theory, mathematical framework, and computational tools to conduct mechanistic modeling of infectious diseases.
schedule_location: M 9am-11:50am in Claudia Nance Rollins AUD
sections: Class Nbr: 2734, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: M 9-11:50a, Instructor: Team, Status: Open
